intro: Illigera yaoshanensis, commonly known as the Yaoshan rock orchid, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the orchid family, Orchidaceae, and is characterized by its compact growth habit and unique floral structure. The plant typically grows on rocky substrates in mountainous regions, showcasing its adaptation to harsh environments. Its flowers are usually small, with intricate patterns and a distinctive coloration that aids in pollination. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, Illigera yaoshanensis is considered a valuable species for botanical research and conservation efforts.
